name: task
description: A simple full-stack notes application built with MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js featuring user authentication and CRUD operations.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && npm run start --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-deps: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
